1160990.name: Morningdew Farms - Cheat Map
1160990.description:
Here's a handy guide to accomplishing all the tasks in Morningdew Farms, getting all the achievements, and wooing all the eligible bachelors!

HOW TO GET YOUR DLC:
Once you purchase and install/download the Cheat Map in the DLC list of Morningdew Farms in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Morningdew Farms) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the cheat map in this folder.
